channel.title: Richscape glitch/bug
channel.description:
ok so here is the problem, any agressive monster is able to attack a player a thoughsand spots away if it is in range at one point. i was talking to rich and he said its in the attackplayer method but yet im not able to fix it, nor find what is causing this.
if you need help i will upload the npchandler that he has but id suggest dl his source and check it out. this will help lots of people

item.title: Richscape glitch/bug
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

AttackPlayer method in the NPCManager class, make it check if the player is in distance to the NPC.

Read full topic
